detail.content: Microbiology | Microbiology                                 Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Microbiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Faculty   Research   Education   Contact Us                                  Home            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                                           Microbiology                                                      The Department of Microbiology at New York University School of Medicine brings together a variety of biomedical researchers united by the common goal of understanding the complex relationship between viral, bacterial or parasitic pathogens and the human host. Ongoing research touches on several important areas of biomedical science including the molecular basis of disease, cancer biology and immunology. Member laboratories are situated within each of the major research buildings within the NYU Langone Medical Center Campus.
